title: [Large-scale] Professional Development Workshop for Technology-Enhanced Math Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Basic Mathematics Education Design and Proficiency in VR/Simulation Tools
context.additional_context: For current professionals, exploring the use of learner engagement design tools and technology integration strategies tailored to mathematics curriculum characteristics

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more customized math learning designs using technology-enhanced tools (e.g., Phoebe-like systems).
Learners can develop one or more rubrics to evaluate the effectiveness of math concept delivery in VR/simulation environments.
Learners can improve draft learning designs by 80% or more based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
